allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Job Search Aggregator

Features:
- Multi-source job scraping (LinkedIn, BuiltIn, Remote sites, Google Jobs)
- Advanced filtering (job title, location type, company size, industry, salary)
- Google Sheets integration for automatic data storage
- Modern React UI with responsive design
- Job deduplication across sources
- Complete documentation and setup guides

Tech Stack:
- Backend: Node.js, Express, Puppeteer, Axios, Cheerio
- Frontend: React 18, Vite, React-Select, RC-Slider
- Integration: Google Sheets API
EOF
)")

Bash(# The server script runs from project root. dotenv.config\(\) without a path arg # looks for .env in CWD. Let''s also check if there''s a .env anywhere on the Desktop # or if it was in a previous git stash/commit cd ""/c/Users/taylo/OneDrive/Desktop/Job Searcher"" echo ""=== git log for .env \(in case it was ever committed\) ==="" git log --all --full-history -- .env)
Bash(# Broader search â€” any .env file anywhere accessible, and also look for the exact name with different path separators find ""/c/Users/taylo"" -iname ""*aggregator*"")
Bash(# Find and kill whatever is on 3001 ss -tlnp | grep 3001 || netstat -tlnp)
